description:
A third party music player for Netease Music


What's Changed
- Update package.json by @flytotmoon in https://github.com/qier222/YesPlayMusic/pull/2347
- fix: 随机模式下当前播放歌曲于列表中的位置出现错误和不同步的情况 by @runnableAir in https://github.com/qier222/YesPlayMusic/pull/2378
- Upgrade actions/upload-artifact to v4 by @akliuxingyuan in https://github.com/qier222/YesPlayMusic/pull/2388
- feat: support media button by @scarletborder in https://github.com/qier222/YesPlayMusic/pull/2375
- feat: use npmmirror for nodejs package managers by @sino1641 in https://github.com/qier222/YesPlayMusic/pull/2356
- Replace NeteaseCloudMusicApi with @neteaseapireborn/api by @axuanran in https://github.com/qier222/YesPlayMusic/pull/2403
New Contributors
- @flytotmoon made their first contribution in https://github.com/qier222/YesPlayMusic/pull/2347
- @akliuxingyuan made their first contribution in https://github.com/qier222/YesPlayMusic/pull/2388
- @scarletborder made their first contribution in https://github.com/qier222/YesPlayMusic/pull/2375
